items.title: configuration item
items.description:
A configuration item for the current repository
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/project-config.html#configuration-items

oneOf.title: pipeline
oneOf.description:
A pipeline of the current repository
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html

pipeline.title: pipeline
pipeline.description:
A pipeline of the current repository
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#pipeline

name.description:
A name of the current pipeline
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.name

manager.description:
A manager of the current pipeline
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.manager

description.description:
A description of the current pipeline
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.description

variant-description.description:
A variant description of the current pipeline
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.variant-description

success-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when all jobs passed
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.success-message

failure-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when at least one job failed
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.failure-message

start-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when jobs have been started
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.start-message

enqueue-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when it has been enqueued
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.enqueue-message

merge-conflict-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when merge failed
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.merge-conflict-message

no-jobs-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when it has been dequeued without running jobs
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.no-jobs-message

dequeue-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when it has been dequeued
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.dequeue-message

footer-message.description:
A message of the current pipeline displayed when jobs ended
https://zuul-ci.org/docs/zuul/latest/config/pipeline.html#attr-pipeline.footer-message
